mapper.select: SELECT skill_id as skillId, skill_name as skillName, verified as verified FROM skills WHERE verified = 1 and status = 1

SELECT sk.skill_id as skillId, sk.skill_name as skillName, sk.verified as verified FROM skills sk INNER JOIN user_skill usk ON usk.skill_id=sk.skill_id INNER JOIN user us ON us.user_id=usk.user_id WHERE usk.user_id=#{userid} and sk.verified = 1 and sk.status = 1

SELECT sk.skill_id as skillId, sk.skill_name as skillName, sk.verified as verified FROM skills sk INNER JOIN projects_skills psk ON psk.skill_id=sk.skill_id INNER JOIN projects pj ON pj.projects_id=psk.projects_id WHERE psk.projects_id=#{projectid} and sk.verified = 1 and sk.status = 1
SELECT skillId as skillId, skill_name as skillName, verified as verified FROM skills WHERE verified = 1 and skill_name=#{skillName} and status = 1
mapper.update: Update skills set skill_name=#{certificateName}, verified=#{company}, status=#{expeditionDate} where skill_id = #{skillId} and status = 1
